chat.msg: Welcome!
Hi, where should i go now?
Hey there
yes?! time is running...
Let me clarify myself
Go left towards the leopard
ok.
Well done, where are you now?
i'm next to the tiger.
Go south west over the bridge
ok.
Awsome, now, what is in front of you?
I'm near the parrot.
Surround the parrot over it,
Then continue east over the gray rocks
done. I'm almost at the frog.
Go on the grass of the frog's island until you are right below the frog
Then go back on the grass (don't touch the trees)
Step on the alligator
oh, i touched the trees under the frog. is it still ok?
Walk to the center of the frog's island,
And then go west (left) to the aligator bridge and cross over it
i crossed it.
Not too sure about that, but maybe this will help
From the big black rock of the crocodile move to the pair of gray rocks next to the giraffe
i passed under the elephant and i'm next to the giraffe.
If you didn't pass near the frog yet, head over the gray rocks towards it
i passed near the frog.
Walk to the center of the frog's island,
And then go west (left) to the aligator bridge and cross over it
i am near the giraffe. should i go back to the frog?!
Go on the grass of the frog's island until you are right below the frog
Then go back on the grass (don't touch the trees)
Step on the alligator
i did it already. should i do it again?
Not too sure about that, but maybe this will help
Go down from the giraffe
Cross the wooden stick to the snake
so i don't continue towards the snake.
Yes
good. done.
Mmm... just...
The treasure is right next to you - go to it!
